pr_title: fix: allocate-tenant fails when run twice

timeline.message:
fix: allocate-tenant fails when run twice

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: As this is being run as maintenance task I supposed we're not going to be too worried about concurrency. Selecting first then inserting what's missing isn't thread-safe but it's probably not a big deal here.
timeline.author: punktilious

replies.bodyText: Good point, I'll have to defer this part... if customers hit we can add USING RS
replies.author: prb112

replies.bodyText: Yeah, I'm not too worried about this in this context.
replies.author: punktilious
